data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description:
emap | 25,628 followers on LinkedIn. emap is a content, subscription and networking business with offices in East Croydon, City of London, Dublin and Bolton. We connect influential people and organisations to a high-value network of decision-makers, data and ideas through our industry-leading portfolio of brands.

emapâ€™s purpose is to drive professional progress for ambitious individuals and companies in Grocery Retail, Travel Retail, Personal Finance, Packaging, Motor Retail, Property, Electronics, AV, Education, Fashion, Architecture, Health and Construction.
